long_description: Whether you're a student, professional or traveler, the REI Uplode Daypack will neatly and comfortably carry your laptop, tablet and the other essentials of your day. Accessible via a separate zipper, the padded rear compartment has a sleeve that holds most 15.6 in. laptops. Compartment also has a neoprene sleeve that can hold most tablets. Pack has 3 zip front pockets; one includes an organizer panel for pens, electronics and other small items. Padded, zippered side pocket can hold a music player; mesh pocket on the other side can hold a water bottle. Comfortable back panel has dual-density padding with ventilation channels. Adjustable shoulder straps are padded and contoured; waistbelt can be tucked away when not needed. Pack has reflective trim; it also includes a clip loop for an LED safety light (sold separately). Finishing touches on the REI Uplode Daypack include outer compression straps and strap keepers that secure the shoulder straps' webbing tails.
short_description: Whether you're a student, professional or traveler, the REI Uplode Daypack will neatly and comfortably carry your laptop, tablet and the other essentials of your day.
